trans-unit.source: Provides a design surface, which renders a visual representation of process flow.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma superfície de design, que renderiza uma representação visual do fluxo do processo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> is the design surface which renders a visual representation of process flow described in workflow markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> é a superfície de design que renderiza uma representação visual do fluxo do processo descrito na marcação de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> offers a rich set of user interface functionality needed by the activity designers for rendering and for responding to various Windows-generated events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> oferece um conjunto avançado de recursos de interface de usuário necessário para os designers de atividade para renderização e responder a diversos eventos gerados pelo Windows.

trans-unit.source: Also, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> offers a set of common functions which can be used by all designers to perform certain activities.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> oferece um conjunto de funções comuns, que pode ser usado por todos os designers executem certas atividades.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> class using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.GetView%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como você pode obter uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> classe usando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.GetView%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The code then sets several <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> properties, including <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A>, and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToScreenSize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O código define várias <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> propriedades, incluindo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A>e chama o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToScreenSize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Tracking Profile Designer SDK Sample from the WorkflowDesignerControl.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do fluxo de trabalho de controle perfil Designer SDK exemplo do arquivo WorkflowDesignerControl.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Tracking Profile Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Designer de perfil de rastreamento de fluxo de trabalho](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa a interface do <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> with the specified service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> com o provedor de serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto.

trans-unit.source: In this example, a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> object is created and the `BeginLoad` method is called passing a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> object as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, um novo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objeto é criado e o `BeginLoad` método é chamado, passando uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> objeto como o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: After creating a new <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object is created using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> created earlier as a parameter to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Depois de criar um novo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity>, um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto é criado usando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> criado anteriormente como um parâmetro para o construtor.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WorkflowViewWrapper.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo Outlook fluxo de trabalho do Assistente de SDK do arquivo WorkflowViewWrapper.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo de Assistente de fluxo de trabalho do Outlook](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> is a component that handles messages from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> é um componente que lida com mensagens de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: Using the `Strategy` design pattern, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> will pass messages to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Usando o `Strategy` padrão de design, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> irá passar mensagens para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> devem ser tratados.

trans-unit.source: Mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events are passed on to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Eventos de mouse, eventos de teclado, eventos de pintura e layout são passados para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> is created and a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object is associated with the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> é criado e um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto está associado à superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: In order to retrieve notifications of messages, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> is created and added to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar as notificações de mensagens, um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> é criado e adicionado para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WorkflowViewWrapper.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo Outlook fluxo de trabalho do Assistente de SDK do arquivo WorkflowViewWrapper.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo de Assistente de fluxo de trabalho do Outlook](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).

trans-unit.source: The `MessageFilter` object created in the previous code is derived from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> class.
trans-unit.target: O `MessageFilter` objeto criado no código anterior é derivado de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> classe.

trans-unit.source: By overriding the methods of this class, the message filter is notified whenever a user interface event occurs on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object.
trans-unit.target: Substituindo os métodos dessa classe, o filtro de mensagem é notificado sempre que ocorre um evento de interface do usuário a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to convert from client coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> para converter de coordenadas de cliente para coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> from client coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> de coordenadas de cliente em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> converted from client coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> convertido de coordenadas de cliente em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> usa dois espaços de coordenadas: lógica e o cliente:

trans-unit.source: Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas do cliente são relativas ao canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area.
trans-unit.target: O canto superior esquerdo é 0,0; x e y coordenadas aumentam verticalmente e horizontalmente na área visível.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> and by the scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de coordenadas do cliente é afetado pelo nível de zoom do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> e a posição da barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0.
trans-unit.target: No sistema de coordenadas lógico cada objeto sempre é mapeado para 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: A posição vertical e horizontalmente não é afetada por posição de zoom ou barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to convert from client to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> para converter de coordenadas de cliente para coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> propriedade é referenciada.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> in a derived class, you should not call the base class <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> em uma classe derivada, você não deve chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o parâmetro descartando é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre `Dispose` e `Finalize`, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Enables the button on the design surface that, when clicked, changes the zoom level of the workflow design surface so that the entire workflow is displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Habilita o botão no design de superfície que, quando clicado, muda o nível de zoom da superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho para que todo o fluxo de trabalho seja exibido no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the dynamic button is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o botão dinâmico estiver habilitado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to enable the fit to screen button.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como habilitar o botão Ajustar à tela.

trans-unit.source: The method first obtains the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface for the designer and then retrieves the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object by using the <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> method before modifying the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnableFitToScreen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método primeiro obtém o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface para o designer e, em seguida, recupera o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto usando o <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> método antes de modificar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnableFitToScreen%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser deixado visível.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> passed is visible, expanding parent objects and scrolling the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> passado é visível, expandindo os objetos pai e rolando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> conforme o necessário.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> when you are working with an object in the workflow that requires user interface cues. <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> will expand parent objects and scroll the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> as necessary to make the object visible on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> quando você estiver trabalhando com um objeto no fluxo de trabalho que requer indicações de interface do usuário. <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> expandirá objetos pai e role a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> conforme o necessário para tornar o objeto visível no designer.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.GetService%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object to return an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.GetService%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> interface.

trans-unit.source: If the service exists, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> is called passing the currently selected activity using the `PrimarySelection` property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço existir, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> é chamado, passando a atividade selecionada no momento usando o `PrimarySelection` propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="selectableObject" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="selectableObject" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level of the workflow design surface so that the entire workflow is displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Altera o nível de zoom da superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho para que todo o fluxo de trabalho seja exibido no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: The actual zoom level is dependent upon the settings of the user's workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: O nível de zoom real depende das configurações do designer de fluxo de trabalho do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to enable the fit to screen button.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como habilitar o botão Ajustar à tela.

trans-unit.source: The method first obtains the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface for the designer and then retrieves the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object by using the <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> method before modifying the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnableFitToScreen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método primeiro obtém o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface para o designer e, em seguida, recupera o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto usando o <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> método antes de modificar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnableFitToScreen%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToScreenSize%2A> method is called to display the entire workflow within the bounds of the displayable area of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToScreenSize%2A> método é chamado para exibir o fluxo de trabalho inteiro dentro dos limites da área de exibição de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: Changes the zoom level to one hundred percent to display the full size of the workflow in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Altera o nível de zoom para 100% para exibir o tamanho total do fluxo de trabalho no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes the properties of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object be setting several properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir inicializa as propriedades de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto definindo várias propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToWorkflowSize%2A> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object to display the full size of the workflow within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToWorkflowSize%2A> faz com que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto para exibir o tamanho total do fluxo de trabalho dentro do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do serviço a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de serviço do tipo especificado, se estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: If the <paramref name="serviceType" /> is <see langword="typeof(" /><see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /><see langword=")" /> then <see langword="GetService" /> returns a specific <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />; otherwise, <see langword="GetService" /> returns a <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementing the requested service, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Se o <paramref name="serviceType" /> for <see langword="typeof(" /><see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /><see langword=")" />, <see langword="GetService" /> retorna um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> específico, caso contrário, <see langword="GetService" /> retorna um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementando o serviço solicitado ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic) se o serviço não puder ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: `GetService` returns a <xref:System.Object> implementing the requested service, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: `GetService` Retorna um <xref:System.Object> implementa o serviço solicitado ou uma referência nula (`Nothing`) se o serviço não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.GetService%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object to return an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.GetService%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> interface.

trans-unit.source: If the service exists, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> is called passing the currently selected activity using the `PrimarySelection` property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço existir, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> é chamado, passando a atividade selecionada no momento usando o `PrimarySelection` propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal scrollbar for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de rolagem horizontal para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> you can use to adjust the settings and visibility of the horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> você pode usar para ajustar as configurações e a visibilidade da barra de rolagem horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como você pode obter uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> classe.

trans-unit.source: The code then sets several <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> properties, including <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A>, and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToWorkflowSize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O código define várias <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> propriedades, incluindo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A>e chama o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToWorkflowSize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see langword="WorkflowView" /> finishes processing and is about to enter the idle state.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see langword="WorkflowView" /> termina o processamento e está prestes a entrar no estado ocioso.

trans-unit.source: If you have tasks to perform before the thread becomes idle, attach them to this event.
trans-unit.target: Se você tiver tarefas a serem executadas antes do thread fica ocioso, anexá-los a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, in client coordinates, to invalidate and cause to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, em coordenadas de cliente, para invalidar e ocasionar a nova pintura.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> and causes it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Invalida o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> especificado e faz com que ele seja pintado novamente.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.InvalidateClientRectangle%2A> to cause a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, in client coordinates, to be added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.InvalidateClientRectangle%2A> para fazer com que um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, nas coordenadas do cliente, a ser adicionada à região de atualização.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, in logical coordinates, to invalidate and cause to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, em coordenadas lógicas, para invalidar e ocasionar a nova pintura.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> and causes it to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Invalida o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> especificado e faz com que ele seja pintado novamente.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.InvalidateLogicalRectangle%2A> to cause a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, in logical coordinates, to be added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.InvalidateLogicalRectangle%2A> para fazer com que um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, em coordenadas lógicas, a ser adicionada à região de atualização.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> used to restore the view state.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> usado para restaurar o estado da exibição.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Restaura as informações do estado de exibição de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> restores view-state information previously saved by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> Restaura as informações de estado de exibição salvas anteriormente chamando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Override this method when you need to customize how a custom designer restores its view-state.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método quando você precisar personalizar como um designer personalizado restaura o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to load the view state for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object by creating a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object with the `FileMode.Open` flag and passing it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como carregar o estado de exibição para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto criando um <xref:System.IO.FileStream> do objeto com o `FileMode.Open` sinalizador e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The view state file was created using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo de estado de exibição foi criado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to convert to client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser convertido em coordenadas de cliente.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> from logical to client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> de coordenadas lógicas para coordenadas de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> converted from logical to client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> convertido de coordenadas lógicas para coordenadas de cliente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> usa dois espaços de coordenadas: lógica e o cliente:

trans-unit.source: Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas do cliente são relativas ao canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area.
trans-unit.target: O canto superior esquerdo é 0,0; x e y coordenadas aumentam verticalmente e horizontalmente na área visível.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> and by the scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de coordenadas do cliente é afetado pelo nível de zoom do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> e a posição da barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0.
trans-unit.target: No sistema de coordenadas lógico cada objeto sempre é mapeado para 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: A posição vertical e horizontalmente não é afetada por posição de zoom ou barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to convert to screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser convertido em coordenadas de tela.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control is added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controle é adicionado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnControlAdded%2A> is called when a child control is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnControlAdded%2A> é chamado quando um controle filho é adicionado para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The only child controls allowed are <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A> controls.
trans-unit.target: Os controles filho somente permitidos são <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A> controles.

trans-unit.source: If the control added is not a <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar" /> or <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar" />
trans-unit.target: Se o controle adicionado não for um <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a dragged item is dropped onto the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um item arrastado é solto no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragDrop%2A> occurs when the user releases the mouse button over the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragDrop%2A> ocorre quando o usuário libera o botão do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is dragged into the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um item é arrastado para os limites de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A> occurs when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A> ocorre quando o usuário arrasta primeiro o cursor do mouse sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor leaves the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o cursor sai do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> occurs when the user drags the mouse cursor out of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> ocorre quando o usuário arrasta o cursor do mouse fora do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer is within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> bounds.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar está em andamento e o ponteiro está dentro dos limites de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> occurs when the mouse cursor moves within bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> ocorre quando o cursor do mouse se move dentro dos limites do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs" /> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> occurs when a drag operation is started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> ocorre quando uma operação de arrastar é iniciada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> allows the source of a drag operation to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> permite que a origem de uma operação de arrastar para modificar a aparência do ponteiro do mouse para fornecer os comentários visuais do usuário durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada enquanto o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> tem o foco.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> deve reposicionar os controles filho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnLayout%2A> occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnLayout%2A> ocorre quando controles filhos são adicionados ou removidos, quando os limites do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> alterações, e quando ocorrem as outras alterações que podem afetar o layout do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseCaptureChanged%2A> occurs when the user makes a selection with the mouse that differs from any existing selection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnMouseCaptureChanged%2A> ocorre quando o usuário faz uma seleção com o mouse que é diferente de qualquer seleção existente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre ao clicar duas vezes no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: The double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O clique duplo é determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode definir o tempo entre cliques de um botão do mouse que deve ser considerada um clique duplo em vez de dois cliques.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag option should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e permite que a origem de arrastar determine se a opção de arrastar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> é gerado quando há uma alteração no estado de botão do teclado ou mouse durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> evento permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Events related to drag operations are raised when the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Eventos relacionados a operações de arrastar são gerados quando o controle é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the drag effect specified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> é gerado com o efeito de arrastar especificado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas.

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse entra em outro controle, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragEnter%2A> para que o controle é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo controle, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the `Action` property of the event <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no estado de botão do teclado ou mouse, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da `Action` propriedade do evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Continue`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragOver%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnGiveFeedback%2A> eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `DragAction.Cancel`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnDragLeave%2A> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> event sets `Action` to `DragAction.Cancel` if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to `DragAction.Drop` if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> conjuntos de eventos `Action` para `DragAction.Cancel` se a tecla ESC foi pressionada e define `Action` para `DragAction.Drop` se o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: The root designer of the workflow is the designer associated with the design surface of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O designer raiz do fluxo de trabalho é o designer associado à superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: It contains all child designers, and subsequently all activities in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ele contém todos os designers de filho e, posteriormente, todas as atividades no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.target: O campo workflowPanel contém um método chamado GetWorkflowView que retorna a instância WorkflowView ativa.

trans-unit.source: The RootDesigner is then cast to a SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner before any action is taken on it.
trans-unit.target: O RootDesigner, em seguida, é convertido para um SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner antes de qualquer ação é executada nele.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> used to store the view state.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> usado para armazenar o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Saves the view-state to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Salva o estado de exibição em um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties and child controls of a view.
trans-unit.target: Estado de exibição é o acúmulo dos valores das propriedades e controles filho de um modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Property values are persisted to the stream after saving and can be restored using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade são mantidos para o fluxo após salvar e pode ser restaurados usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates saving the view state for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object by creating a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object using the `FileMode.Create` flag and passing it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra a salvar o estado de exibição para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto criando um <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objeto usando o `FileMode.Create` sinalizador e passá-lo para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.SaveViewState%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To load this view state at a later time, see <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para carregar esse estado de exibição em um momento posterior, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.LoadViewState%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to convert from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> para converter de coordenadas de tela para coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> de coordenadas de tela em coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> converted from screen coordinates to logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> convertido de coordenadas de tela para coordenadas lógicas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> uses two coordinate spaces: logical and client:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> usa dois espaços de coordenadas: lógica e o cliente:

trans-unit.source: Client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas do cliente são relativas ao canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The upper-left corner is 0,0; x and y coordinates increase vertically and horizontally in the viewable area.
trans-unit.target: O canto superior esquerdo é 0,0; x e y coordenadas aumentam verticalmente e horizontalmente na área visível.

trans-unit.source: The client coordinate system is affected by the zoom level of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> and by the scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de coordenadas do cliente é afetado pelo nível de zoom do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> e a posição da barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: In the logical coordinate system every object is always mapped to 0,0.
trans-unit.target: No sistema de coordenadas lógico cada objeto sempre é mapeado para 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The position vertically and horizontally is not affected by zoom or scrollbar position.
trans-unit.target: A posição vertical e horizontalmente não é afetada por posição de zoom ou barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the scrollbar on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição da barra de rolagem no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: A point describing the location of the scrollbar in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto que descreve o local da barra de rolagem em coordenadas da tela.

trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ScrollPosition%2A> para obter ou ajustar o local da barra de rolagem na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="infoTipText" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="infoTipText" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The text to display.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> specifying the location on the screen to place the <see langword="ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> especificando o local na tela para colocar o <see langword="ToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: Shows a <see langword="ToolTip" /> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o <see langword="ToolTip" /> no local especificado.

trans-unit.source: `ToolTips` are helpful notes to the user that display useful information about an object underneath the pointer.
trans-unit.target: `ToolTips` são observações úteis para o usuário que exibem informações úteis sobre um objeto sob o ponteiro.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ShowInPlaceToolTip%2A> to display a `ToolTip` with the specified text and a desired location.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ShowInPlaceToolTip%2A> para exibir um `ToolTip` com o texto especificado e o local desejado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do serviço a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the service of the specified type, if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o serviço do tipo especificado, se estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementing the requested service, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementando o serviço solicitado ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic) se o serviço não puder ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: If the `serviceType` is `CommandID` this method will return a specific `CommandID`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `serviceType` é `CommandID` esse método retornará um determinado `CommandID`.

trans-unit.source: For any other `Type`, `GetService` will return an Object that implements the requested service, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Para qualquer outro `Type`, `GetService` retornará um objeto que implementa o serviço solicitado ou uma referência nula (`Nothing`) se o serviço não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.GetService%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object to return an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.GetService%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> interface.

trans-unit.source: If the service exists, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> is called passing the currently selected activity using the `PrimarySelection` property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço existir, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.EnsureVisible%2A> é chamado, passando a atividade selecionada no momento usando o `PrimarySelection` propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The message to be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem a ser expedida.

trans-unit.source: You cannot modify this message.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível modificar essa mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Filters out a message before it is dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Filtra uma mensagem antes que ela seja expedida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to filter the message and stop it from being dispatched; <see langword="false" /> to allow the message to continue to the next filter or control.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para filtrar a mensagem e impedir sua expedição; <see langword="false" /> para permitir que a mensagem continue até o próximo filtro ou controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle" /> atual para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that describes the area on the screen that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que descreve a área na tela que é visível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle%2A> contains the visible area of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle%2A> contém a área visível do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a method of handling the Paint event of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object to draw an image directly on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra um método de manipular o evento de pintura do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto no qual desenhar uma imagem diretamente de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle%2A> property returns the viewable area on the design surface to correctly constrain the image being drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.ViewPortRectangle%2A> propriedade retorna a área visível na superfície de design para restringir corretamente a imagem a ser desenhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the visible area for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da área visível para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Size" /> that describes the visible area of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Size" /> que descreve a área visível do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the visible area of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da área visível a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scrollbar associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de rolagem vertical associada à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> you can use to adjust the settings and visibility of the horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> você pode usar para ajustar as configurações e a visibilidade da barra de rolagem horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A> to get the vertical scrollbar on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, which you can use to make user interface adjustments.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A> para obter a barra de rolagem vertical no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>, que você pode usar para fazer ajustes de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como você pode obter uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> classe.

trans-unit.source: The code then sets several <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> properties, including <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A>, and calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToWorkflowSize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O código define várias <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> propriedades, incluindo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.HScrollBar%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.VScrollBar%2A>e chama o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.FitToWorkflowSize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The Windows Message to process.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem do Windows a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.WndProc%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens são enviadas para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.WndProc%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.WndProc%2A> método corresponde exatamente ao Windows `WindowProc` função.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de mensagens do Windows, consulte o `WindowProc` documentação de função na referência do SDK da plataforma Windows localizado na biblioteca MSDN.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should call the base class <see langword="WndProc" /> method to process any messages not handled.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas devem chamar a classe base <see langword="WndProc" /> método para processar as mensagens não tratadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom level of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nível de zoom do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: The zoom level of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Nível de zoom do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the zoom feature to enlarge or reduce the size of the components inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Use o recurso de zoom para ampliar ou reduzir o tamanho dos componentes dentro do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> sets the minimum and maximum zoom levels for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> define os níveis de zoom mínimo e máximo para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.Zoom%2A> property of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.Zoom%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: If the zoom level is less than the minimum zoom level of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" />
trans-unit.target: Se o nível de zoom for menor que o nível de zoom mínimo do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: if the zoom level exceeds the maximum zoom level of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: se o nível de zoom exceder o nível de zoom máximo do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the zoom setting for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a configuração de zoom para a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: The workflow view image is created as a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de exibição do fluxo de trabalho é criada como um bitmap.
